## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the appropriate option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style
- [ ] I have added comments for complex logic
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested on my target platform

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This change does NOT break backwards compatibility
- [ ] If breaking: I have documented the migration path
- [ ] If breaking: I have updated the CHANGELOG
